thread.title: clean and inm a good location
thread.title_full: clean and inm a good location - Review of Hotel des Comedies, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: TravelMan956
title: clean and inm a good location
text: bad start in that the lift was broken and we had to carry bags up to the fourth floor. The one person on duty did offer to help but as he was on his own that would have to be later and we were in a rush. Was not fixed until the next day. I realise these things happen but I think the hotel should have had an extra person on duty in the circumstances. I asked for compensation and we were given a complimentary breakfast. The breakfast itself was very average and the fact that the person on duty was eating was a bit off-putting. Having said all that, the room was clean and comfortable and the location is very good, so overall we were happy with our stay.
